name: CAPSULE OF VENGEANCE: A bitter pill for cuboids
name_original: CAPSULE OF VENGEANCE: A bitter pill for cuboids
description:
CAPSULE OF VENGEANCE: A bitter pill for cuboids

Made by Alfie275 ( alfie275@labcoat.xyz or alfie275@gmail.com )

Controls:

WASD Move
Mouse Look
Left click Fire
R Swap weapon
Space Jump

Gamepad may be used but probably needs to be rebound in the launcher

Game contains abstract violence and light usage of curse words
